description: Replaces the title of a pull request.

parameters.name: pullRequestId
parameters.description: The system-generated ID of the pull request. To get this ID, use  ListPullRequests.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The updated title of the pull request. This replaces the existing title.

nested_items.name: pullRequest
nested_items.description: Information about the updated pull request.

nested_items.name: pullRequestId
nested_items.description: The system-generated ID of the pull request.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The user-defined title of the pull request. This title is displayed in the list of pull requests to other repository users.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The user-defined description of the pull request. This description can be used to clarify what should be reviewed and other details of the request.

nested_items.name: lastActivityDate
nested_items.description: The day and time of the last user or system activity on the pull request, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time the pull request was originally created, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: pullRequestStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the pull request. Pull request status can only change from OPEN to CLOSED.

nested_items.name: authorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who created the pull request.

nested_items.name: pullRequestTargets
nested_items.description: The targets of the pull request, including the source branch and destination branch for the pull request.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository that contains the pull request source and destination branches.

nested_items.name: sourceReference
nested_items.description: The branch of the repository that contains the changes for the pull request. Also known as the source branch.

nested_items.name: destinationReference
nested_items.description: The branch of the repository where the pull request changes are merged. Also known as the destination branch.

nested_items.name: destinationCommit
nested_items.description: The full commit ID that is the tip of the destination branch. This is the commit where the pull request was or will be merged.

nested_items.name: sourceCommit
nested_items.description: The full commit ID of the tip of the source branch used to create the pull request. If the pull request branch is updated by a push while the pull request is open, the commit ID changes to reflect the new tip of the branch.

nested_items.name: mergeBase
nested_items.description: The commit ID of the most recent commit that the source branch and the destination branch have in common.

nested_items.name: mergeMetadata
nested_items.description: Returns metadata about the state of the merge, including whether the merge has been made.

nested_items.name: isMerged
nested_items.description: A Boolean value indicating whether the merge has been made.

nested_items.name: mergedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who merged the branches.

nested_items.name: mergeCommitId
nested_items.description: The commit ID for the merge commit, if any.

nested_items.name: mergeOption
nested_items.description: The merge strategy used in the merge.

nested_items.name: clientRequestToken
nested_items.description: A unique, client-generated idempotency token that, when provided in a request, ensures the request cannot be repeated with a changed parameter. If a request is received with the same parameters and a token is included, the request returns information about the initial request that used that token.

nested_items.name: revisionId
nested_items.description: The system-generated revision ID for the pull request.

nested_items.name: approvalRules
nested_items.description: The approval rules applied to the pull request.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleId
nested_items.description: The system-generated ID of the approval rule.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the approval rule.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleContent
nested_items.description: The content of the approval rule.

nested_items.name: ruleContentSha256
nested_items.description: The SHA-256 hash signature for the content of the approval rule.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date the approval rule was most recently changed, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date the approval rule was created, in timestamp format.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedUser
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who made the most recent changes to the approval rule.

nested_items.name: originApprovalRuleTemplate
nested_items.description: The approval rule template used to create the rule.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleTemplateId
nested_items.description: The ID of the template that created the approval rule.

nested_items.name: approvalRuleTemplateName
nested_items.description: The name of the template that created the approval rule.
